alert.note: Alert for Northern Litchfield; Southern Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 10:56PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Litchfield, northeastern Ulster, Dutchess, southwestern Columbia and southeastern Greene Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1056 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Woodstock to near New Milford. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Poughkeepsie, New Milford, Kingston, New Paltz, Hudson, Catskill, Saugerties, Sherman, Rhinebeck, Pawling, Hyde Park, Pleasant Valley, Hurley, Woodstock, Amenia, Livingston, Kent, Sharon, Highland and Pine Plains. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 18 and 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
